text:
Hey,

if you are a HubSpot/MA technical expert. Ideally with experience of paid advertising also, we're hiring (open for various kind of contracts).
We are about 100 people, 75 of us are remotes (across all seniority levels).
We're based in Sweden, working across Europe.

Contact me @ <mailto:fredrik.gunnarsson@brightvision.com|fredrik.gunnarsson@brightvision.com> if you are interested.

Look at <http://www.brightvision.com|www.brightvision.com> for more about us as a company
